body.p: In our example, we have a scenario "extract and verify item price," which consists of these steps:

ol.li: Navigate to the AUT - Katalon Zack Market: https://demo-store.katalon.com.
On the homepage, select an item.
On the item details page, extract the item price.
Verify that the item price is in the correct pattern: a currency symbol ($) followed by a numeric value.

body.p: Our AUT displays the price text of an item as follows:
We can see that the price text consists of the item price ($25.99) and the currency code (CAD).
To automate the scenario with Katalon Recorder, we propose the following process:

ol.li: Record the test case: we record the test case to open the AUT and select an item.
Extract and verify textual patterns: we manually modify the recorded test case to select and verify the price text.
